progetto.view.gui

Class ChangeDiceValuePaneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • progetto.view.gui.AbstractController
      • progetto.view.gui.ChangeDiceValuePaneController

  • public class ChangeDiceValuePaneController
extends AbstractController
    this is the class that handles the change dice value fxml. This class is only instanced by javafx, this mean that must have a default constructor.
    Author:
    Federica

      private void onChooseButtonClicked()

      set up this object, it is equivalent to a constructor since there is no access to it

      called when round information changes add and remove this scene when it is needed update the scene with the selected dice
